org.apache.ignite.ml.nn.trainers.distributed

Class MLPGroupUpdateTrainer<U extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group.MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer<MLPGroupUpdateTrainerLocalContext,Void,MLPGroupTrainingCacheValue,U,MultilayerPerceptron,U,MultilayerPerceptron,AbstractMLPGroupUpdateTrainerInput,MLPGroupUpdateTrainingContext<U>,ArrayList<U>,MLPGroupUpdateTrainingLoopData<U>,U>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.nn.trainers.distributed.MLPGroupUpdateTrainer<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - Type of update.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trainer<MultilayerPerceptron,AbstractMLPGroupUpdateTrainerInput>

    public class MLPGroupUpdateTrainer<U extends Serializable>
extends MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer<MLPGroupUpdateTrainerLocalContext,Void,MLPGroupTrainingCacheValue,U,MultilayerPerceptron,U,MultilayerPerceptron,AbstractMLPGroupUpdateTrainerInput,MLPGroupUpdateTrainingContext<U>,ArrayList<U>,MLPGroupUpdateTrainingLoopData<U>,U>
    Update-based distributed training of MLP.

                                                                             MLPGroupUpdateTrainerLocalContext locCtx)

      • extractContextForFinalResultCreation

        protected IgniteSupplier<MLPGroupUpdateTrainingContext<U>> extractContextForFinalResultCreation(U data,
                                                                                                MLPGroupUpdateTrainerLocalContext locCtx)
        Extract context for final result creation. Each key from the final keys set will be processed with finalResultsExtractor. While entry data (i.e. key and value) for each key varies, some data can be common for all processed entries. This data is called context.
        Parameters:
        data - Data returned from last training loop step.
        locCtx - Local context.
        Returns:
        Context.

      • finalResultsExtractor

        protected IgniteFunction<EntryAndContext<Void,MLPGroupTrainingCacheValue,MLPGroupUpdateTrainingContext<U>>,ResultAndUpdates<MultilayerPerceptron>> finalResultsExtractor()

        Returns:
        Function for extracting final result from each key specified in finalResultKeys.
